"By tapping Confirm, you acknowledge you have read & agree to the Global Shipping Program %s and are accepting the seller's offer & any additional seller specified terms and agreeing to & entering into a binding contract to buy this item from the seller."
"By tapping Confirm, you're agreeing to & entering into a binding contract to buy this item from the seller if the seller accepts your offer & terms."

"By tapping Confirm, you acknowledge you have read & agree to the Global Shipping Program %s and are agreeing to & entering into a binding contract to buy this item from the seller if the seller accepts your offer & terms. You're responsible for reading the full item listing."
By tapping Confirm", you're accepting the buyer's offer & any additional buyer specified terms and agreeing to & entering into a binding contract to sell this item to the buyer. "
By tapping Confirm", you're agreeing to & entering into a binding contract to sell this item to the buyer if the buyer accepts your offer & terms. "

"By tapping Confirm Bid, you acknowledge you have read & agree to the Global Shipping Program %s and are agreeing to & entering into a binding contract to buy this item from the seller if you're the winning bidder. You're responsible for reading the full item listing."

"By tapping Buy it now, you acknowledge you have read & agree to the Global Shipping Program %s and are agreeing to & entering into a binding contract to buy this item from the seller. You're responsible for reading the full item listing."
By tapping Confirm", you're accepting the seller's offer & any additional seller specified terms and agreeing to & entering into a binding contract to buy this item from the seller. "
By tapping Confirm", you're agreeing to & entering into a binding contract to buy this item from the seller if the seller accepts your offer & terms. "

By tapping Confirm", you're agreeing to & entering into a binding contract to buy this item from the seller if the seller accepts your offer & terms. You're responsible for reading the full item listing. "
If your item sells, you will be charged a final value fee based on the total cost to the buyer, including postage, packaging and any other related costs.
By tapping %s, you agree to pay the fees above, accept the listing conditions above, and assume full responsibility for the content of the listing and the item offered.
By tapping Confirm", you're accepting the buyer's offer & any additional buyer specified terms and agreeing to & entering into a binding contract to sell this item to the buyer. "
By tapping Confirm", you're agreeing to & entering into a binding contract to sell this item to the buyer if the buyer accepts your offer & terms. "
By tapping Confirm Bid", you're agreeing to & entering into a binding contract to buy this item from the seller if you're the winning bidder. You're responsible for reading the full item listing."
By tapping Buy it now", you're agreeing to & entering into a binding contract to buy this item from the seller. You're responsible for reading the full item listing. "

We may serve you customized advertising in this Mobile Application (“App”) using information we collect from this App or our other eBay Inc. Services. You can opt out of customized advertising in this App either by using your device advertising preference settings or by changing your advertising preferences in your eBay account. You will still see advertising within this App if you opt out, it will just not be customized to you.

"Automatically relisted items count towards monthly free-insertion-fee limits. Insertion fees apply when this limit is exceeded.

"There is no insertion fee for automatically relisting this item and it won't count against monthly free-insertion-fee limits.

\"By tapping Accept offer", you're accepting the seller's offer & any additional seller specified terms and agreeing to & entering into a binding contract to buy this item from the seller.\""
\"By tapping Submit counteroffer", you're agreeing to & entering into a binding contract to buy this item from the seller if the seller accepts your offer & terms.\""
By scheduling eBay Now delivery, you agree to receive delivery updates by text message. Wireless carrier charges may apply. You also agree to the eBay Now terms.
If your item sells, you will be charged a final value fee based on the total cost to the buyer, including postage, packaging and any other related costs.
Refunds by law. You may have %s regarding applicable refunds.

"By tapping Accept offer, you acknowledge you have read & agree to the Global Shipping Program %s and are accepting the seller's offer & any additional seller specified terms and agreeing to & entering into a binding contract to buy this item from the seller."
This item will be shipped through the Global Shipping Program and includes international tracking.

"By tapping Submit offer, you acknowledge you have read & agree to the Global Shipping Program %s and are agreeing to & entering into a binding contract to buy this item from the seller if the seller accepts your offer & terms. You're responsible for reading the full item listing."

"By tapping Confirm bid, you acknowledge you have read & agree to the Global Shipping Program %s and are agreeing to & entering into a binding contract to buy this item from the seller if you're the winning bidder. You're responsible for reading the full item listing."

"By tapping Commit to buy, you acknowledge you have read & agree to the Global Shipping Program %s and are agreeing to & entering into a binding contract to buy this item from the seller. You're responsible for reading the full item listing."
Will usually ship same business day.

Sorry, but the seller has no bank account details on file. Please contact the seller to get his bank account details so you can transfer the amount to him.

"Hello %1$s,
I recently bought item %2$s from you. Now I would like to pick-up and pay for this item in person. Therefore I would like to ask you to suggest a time for that and to provide your exact address.
Thank you, %3$s"
Shipping cost may not be applicable because you are picking up the item and paying in person. Please ask the seller to confirm this.

"Hello %1$s, I recently bought item %2$s from you. Now I would like to pay for this item via electronic funds transfer. As you didn't supply your bank information when you posted this item, please can you send me this information so that I may complete this transaction. Thank you, %3$s"

"Select the item condition which best represents your item. Available options are based on the category you've selected."
"The description you provide should include accurate details of the item's condition, any item defects or other relevant information like brand names, model numbers and dimensions."
To ensure accurate delivery estimates, specify your handling time (time to ship the item after a buyer pays) and include the item location.
Ensure that buyers pay for the item immediately. This option is only available on Buy It Now listings if you select PayPal as your payment method.

Item specifics provide a quick overview of key details to help buyers find your item using search refinements and filters. The available options vary by category and may be required in some categories.
Choose the payment type that buyers will use to pay for your item. If PayPal is one of your options, enter your PayPal ID email address.
Items with good photos are more likely to sell. Be sure to include as many photos as necessary to help buyers see what they are buying!

"• Use a plain fabric backdrop that provides good contrast with your item. • Avoid background clutter or items that are not included. • Photograph items at close range and at different angles. • Use indoor lighting without a flash. • Include photos of specific details like labels, packaging, and accessories. • If the item has any flaws, wear, or damage, be sure to document it with a photo. • For some items it may be useful to include another object as a point of reference for its size. • Don't copy pictures (without permission) from another seller or manufacturer/retailer."
eBay offers a variety of options for buying an item: Bid (auction), Buy It Now (fixed price) or Make Offer (best offer). You can list your item using the following formats or combinations:
Buyers can bid any amount until the listing ends. Select Auction as your format and enter an auction start price for your item.

Give buyers a choice by offering both a starting bid and a Buy It Now price. Select Auction as your format and enter a price into both the Auction start price and the Buy It Now price fields. The Buy It Now option will be removed from the item when a bid is placed and exceeds a percent of the Buy It Now price (varies by category).

Items with a longer duration tend to result in higher bid prices and increase your chances of selling your item. Listings will start immediately by default. For an additional fee, you can schedule your listing to start on the day and time of your choice.
Buyers can purchase the item anytime until the listing ends. Select Fixed price as your format then enter the price of the item into the Buy It Now field and the quantity available to sell.

Allow buyers to suggest a price they’re willing to pay for your item. You can accept the offer and sell the item at that price or propose a counteroffer. Each offer is valid for 48 hours. To make it easier for sellers, you can also choose to automatically accept or decline offers of a specific value. (best offer availability varies by listing category and your account eligibility).

"Add a reserve price to your auction to set the minimum amount that you're willing to sell your item for. Buyers will be informed if their bid has not met the Reserve price. The Reserve price must be higher than the auction start price and lower than your Buy It Now price. (Optional, fees apply)"
eBay provides a full summary of product details for items in the eBay catalog.
Items with clearly defined return policies tend to outsell similar items without a return policy.

Make sure your buyers know the total cost of your item by adding accurate shipping costs. You can choose multiple shipping options at different prices to allow the buyer to choose how to ship the item.
"Simply ship items to the domestic shipping center. We'll manage the postage and customs process and send the item to the international buyer."
Provide even more details for buyers to see when viewing a list of results. (optional, small fee applied).
Use descriptive words and details (brand, size, color, etc.) that help distinguish your item. Titles can be up to 80 characters.
The current category is not supported for selling via our app at this time. Please complete your listing on the website or begin a new listing in a supported category.
